row.process:
:INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_CMDLINE_CMD@WINDOWS
:SET &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# = &BACKUP_DIR_UNIQUE# :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CONVERT_SLASHES_WINDOWS_STYLE :SET &BACKUP_DIR_UNIQUE# = &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING#
:SET &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# = &UC4RB_TC_HOME_DIR# :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CONVERT_SLASHES_WINDOWS_STYLE :SET &UC4RB_TC_HOME_DIR# = &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING#
copy "&BACKUP_DIR_UNIQUE#\server.xml" "&UC4RB_TC_HOME_DIR#\conf" /Y :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_CMDLINE_CMD@WINDOWS echo "Copied &BACKUP_DIR_UNIQUE#\server.xml to &UC4RB_TC_HOME_DIR#\conf" copy "&BACKUP_DIR_UNIQUE#\context.xml" "&UC4RB_TC_HOME_DIR#\conf" /Y :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_CMDLINE_CMD@WINDOWS echo "Copied &BACKUP_DIR_UNIQUE#\context.xml to &UC4RB_TC_HOME_DIR#\conf"
